title: Because We Have This!
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>It’s been a while since we had a unit practice, huh.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>It’s not every day that everyone but the three of us can’t come to practice after all. But I think it’s better if we have unit practice on a regular basis.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin thinks so too nya. Because Rin feels more tired than usual~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Well, that just means we need to get used to it. Both μ’s and lily white are important, so we have to practice around the same amount for both.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>You’re right. I’ll talk about it with Honoka and the others tomorrow.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hey, hey, Rin is starving after practice nya. Want to go get some ramen?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Now that you mention it, I’m also hungry. I think I’ll have a miso ramen~, what about you, Umi-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I’m also coming!? I’ll.... have a shoyu ramen.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>It’s tonkotsu for me! With extra noodles nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Then, let’s race to the ramen place! Ready~, go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
